column1: * 1916 – J.R.R. Tolkien is struck by http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trench_fever trench fever
column2: which ends his contribution to the World War I after just 5 months.
the fifth episode of the The Hobbit (1968 radio series) of The Hobbit

column1: * 1983 - The Book of Lost Tales Part One is published in the UK.
* 1992 - Sauron Defeated is published in the US.
* 1992 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien (revised edition) is published.
* 1995 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Artist and Illustrator is published.
* 2005 - Tolkiens Modern Middle Ages is published.

column2: featuring J.R.R. Tolkien as a fictional character

column1: * 2011 - A revised updated single-edition version of The History of The Hobbit is published.
* 2011 - The Art of The Hobbit is published.
* 2011 - From Elvish to Klingon is published.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
